settings.editor: The Burj Khalifa is the world's tallest building situated in Dubai, UAE. Burj Khalifa's height is 829.8 m (2,722 ft). The building is a marvel of modern architecture and technology. The Burj Khalifa holds records for 160 floors with the longest elevator. It has the highest outdoor observatory deck (148th floor) in the world. The Y-shaped floor plan maximizes views of the Arabian Gulf. The Burj Khalifa entry fee is also reasonable. Book your Burj Khalifa At the Top tickets and travel to Burj Khalifa Dubai Mall with desertdaytravels now!

settings.editor:
At the Top - Burj Khalifa Tickets

It has a display of artefacts showcasing Arab art and culture that tell an enchanting story of how Arabian life is. Moreover, you’ll indeed be awestruck by the Arabian Mashrabiya-inspired decoration as you enter the very spacious observation decks of the Burj Khalifa. Up at the height of 452 meters, it’s exhilarating to take in the breathtaking views of Dubai from the public observation deck.

Zoom up the tallest building in the world, the Burj Khalifa in the fastest double-deck elevator climbing at 10m/sec. Once you’ve made it to the observation deck, enjoy a bird’s eye view of Dubai’s stunning expanse from the two observation decks. Moreover, depending on the ticket you buy for Burj Khalifa, you are granted access to either one or both decks.

The Burj Khalifa At the Top Tickets allows you to explore the 124th, 148th, and 154th floors unrestrained. From the floor's observation deck, zoom in on a close-up view of one of the city’s many iconic landmarks through the very advanced and high-power telescopes.

What to expect

Top up on the 124th floor to marvel at the landscape through high-powered telescopes. Level 125 celebrates Arab art and culture with spectacular performances. Additionally, opt for the Top Sky Ticket for access to floors 124, 125, and 148, where at 555 metres, you get to enjoy 360-degree views from the sky elevator. At last, hike the world's highest floor, The Lounge, Burj Khalifa, 585 metres above the ground level, and lose yourself in the cloud. After completing the tour, stroll the world's largest mall, the Dubai Mall, and make your evening mesmerising with the Dubai Fountain show when you come down.

Experience the thrill of riding in the world's fastest elevator to the 124th and 125th floors of Burj Khalifa. Once there, you will be given a brief multimedia presentation that highlights the history of Dubai and its most iconic structure, the Burj Khalifa. On the 124th floor, immerse yourself in breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf.

Together with, head up to the 125th floor to visit the open-air terrace and observation deck. Here, you have the unique opportunity to view the vastness of the sea and desert from the highest accessible point in Dubai. Additionally, for a limited time, you can witness the serene beauty of the sunrise from Level 124 of Burj Khalifa. So, if you want a more advanced experience, consider an optional upgrade to access the Sky Lounge on Level 148 along with an introductory tour. Get your Burj Khalifa At the Top tickets.

Burj Khalifa At the Top Tickets Options

1. At the Top: 124th & 125th Floor (Off-peak & Peak Hours)

2. At the Sky: 148th Floor (Off-peak & Peak Hours)

3. World's Highest Lounge: 154th Floor (Off-peak & Peak Hours)

4. At the Top + Dubai Mall Aquarium & Underwater Zoo

5. The Burj Club Brunch

How to reach

  • When booking a tour with desertdaytravels, you can choose transportation services.
  • Otherwise, for those visiting Burj Khalifa on their own, using the metro is highly recommended. 
  • Additionally, for car travellers, easy and convenient bookings from your hotel to Dubai Mall are available. Metro users should take the Red Line to Burj Khalifa/Dubai Mall Station and access Burj Khalifa through Dubai Mall.

 

Some Important Information

  • The tickets at Burj Khalifa are for different time slots. Book the tickets from the currently available slots for the amazing Burj Khalifa experience.
  • Please carry the ticket voucher along with a copy of your passport or Emirates ID. You’ll need to present them before the staff of the ‘At the Top Will Call' counter.
  • The booking is valid only for the slot and date selected at the time of booking.
  • The tickets can be used just once and they can’t be transferred.
  • Any lost/damaged ticket will not be replaced or refunded.
  • Transfers can be booked with us at additional charges.

Cancellation Policy

  • No cancellation charges shall be applied if the bookings are cancelled 48 hours before the tour.
  • A 100% cancellation charge shall be applied if the tour is cancelled within 48 hours of the booking.
  • If you are eligible for a refund, the amount will be credited to your account within 7 working days.

Child Policy

  • Entry is free for children below 2.
  • Those between 3 and 8 years of age are considered children and charged at child rates.
  • Those above 8 are considered adults and are charged at standard rates.

The best time to visit Burj Khalifa

As Dubai is otherwise a hot and humid city, it’s best to visit the city between September and February when the weather in the city is at its best. There’s a gentle breeze blowing and the temperatures don’t reach an extreme. You’ll just love being in Dubai at that time of the year.

View of Dubai city

With the best Burj Khalifa entry fee ticket, you’ll love to know about the many interesting things that abound in the iconic building. Furthermore, the building boasts the world’s highest elevator system that covers all 160 floors—a major attraction among the hordes of tourists that throng the Burj Khalifa. Additionally, enjoy the breathtaking aerial views of Dubai that spread far and wide down below the building from the observation decks on the 124th or the 148th floors. You are sure to reach for your camera in no time to capture the spectacular views.

As you enter the city, the first thing that certainly grabs your attention is the gorgeous Burj Khalifa. Indeed, when you take a glance at this magnificent creation, the first word that will strike your mind is ‘WOW.’ The Burj Khalifa tickets let you explore the magnanimity of this astonishing wonder of Dubai. Thus, the intimidating architecture, the mind-blowing features, and the amenities of Burj Khalifa will leave you overwhelmed. Furthermore, the tones of concrete, glass, and aluminium used to define this splendid 21st-century masterpiece are truly praiseworthy.

  • If you want to save time

Burj Khalifa is one of the world famous attractions of Dubai, which means you will find long queues at the site. Therefore, you must buy our Burj Khalifa skip-the-line tickets and avoid wasting time in queues.

  • If you want to enjoy an ecstatic view at an extraordinary price

The At the Top tickets of Burj Khalifa are what you need if you want to cherish a bird’s eye view of Dubai City without spending a fortune. These are the standard tickets, and you can buy them at discounted rates. Hence, get them to enjoy a captivating city view from the At the Top. The Burj Khalifa entry fee is also included.

  • If you want to enjoy a premium experience

Explore the At the Top Sky on the 148th & 154th floor to witness a marvellous view of Dubai cityscape. Besides, you can enjoy luxurious Arabian hospitality here, followed by mouth-watering delicacies.

  • If you want to explore more in Dubai mall & Burj Khalifa

Get our Burj Khalifa combo tickets to explore every corner of Dubai, including the Burj Khalifa with Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo, Dubai Fountain Boardwalk, & Dubai Fountain Lake Ride.

FAQs

Q. What is included in the Burj Khalifa At the top tickets?

The Burj Khalifa entrance ticket gives visitors access to the observation deck as per the ticket selection, which offers stunning views of the city and the surrounding desert. Visitors can also enjoy interactive exhibits and multimedia displays that showcase the history and engineering behind this incredible building. The ticket will give you access to the entire floor and you are going to have fun exploring and looking around.

Q. How long does it take to reach At The Top?

The journey to At The Top of the Burj Khalifa takes around 60 seconds in one of the building's high-speed elevators, which can travel at a speed of up to 10 meters per second. Also, The elevator ride is a very unique and thrilling experience for tourists.

Q. Is there a dress code for visiting the Burj Khalifa?

Visitors should dress appropriately even though the Burj Khalifa does not enforce a strict dress code. They should avoid wearing shorts, beachwear, and flip-flops. Moreover, they should not wear short or revealing clothes, as people consider these vulgar.

Q. Can I take photos at the Burj Khalifa?

Yes, the Burj Khalifa allows visitors to take photos on the observation deck. Furthermore, there are also professional photographers on-site who can take your photo with the building as a backdrop for an additional fee. Also, bear in mind that you cannot take pictures of other people without asking them.

Q. Are there still any restrictions on the number of people who can visit the Burj Khalifa at one time?

There is no such restriction as of now. Hence, visitors are advised to check the latest guidance and restrictions before booking their tickets. Also, the venue has its set of rules so be sure to follow them to the fullest.

Q. What are the operating hours for the Burj Khalifa Observation Deck?

Certainly, the Observation Deck is open from 9:00 AM to 11:00 PM daily.

Q. What is the Burj Khalifa entry fee? 

Entrance to the Burj Khalifa (124th and 125th floors), priced from AED 184, which gives you access to the exterior and interior observation decks on the 124th and 125th floors of the Burj Khalifa.

Q. Can children visit the Observation Deck, and what is the policy?

Indeed, children aged 3 to 8 years can visit. Child tickets are required.

Q. Is there an additional charge for the private transfer service?

Yes, private transfers are available at an additional charge, or you can rent a car from desertdaytravels.

Q. What highlights can I expect from the Burj Khalifa visit?

Expect to experience the world's highest lounge and view the world's largest aquarium.

Q. Can I visit the Burj Khalifa Dubai Mall at night?

Yes, the Burj Khalifa observation deck is open until late 11:00 pm, allowing visitors to enjoy the stunning views of the Dubai city at night. Experts recommend booking tickets in advance, especially for night-time slots, which are in high demand. The night slots also draw large crowds of tourists, potentially leading to crowded conditions.

Q. Are there any age restrictions for visiting the Burj Khalifa Dubai Mall?

There are no specific age restrictions for visiting the Burj Khalifa, but children under the age of 12 must be accompanied by an adult at all times. It is also recommended to take caution as well as ensure the safety of children while on the observation deck due to the height of the building. Young children should always be supervised by their parents at all times.

Q. Is food and drink available on the Burj Khalifa 124th floor?

Yes, there is a cafe located on the Top of the Burj Khalifa where visitors can purchase snacks, drinks, and light meals. However, prices can be higher than usual due to the location and exclusivity of the experience. Also, you cannot bring outside food into the building.

Q. How many floors does the Burj Khalifa Dubai Mall have?

Although the Burj Khalifa comprises 163 floors, it grants guests access only up to the 154th floor. Also, the 124th and 125th floors, which host the Top Observatory, and the 148th floor, home to the New Sky Deck Observatory, are among the highlights.

Q. What’s the best time of the day to visit the Burj Khalifa?

The best time to visit Burj Khalifa is the Sunset time i.e. 8:30 pm. However, the Sunset timing changes as per the seasons. The Burj Khalifa entry fee also changes with time slots.

Q. Is it wise to book the tickets in advance?

It sure is. The Burj Khalifa is a very popular tourist destination. You would do well to book tickets in advance to avoid last minute rush. For a full refund, make sure that you make any cancellations for Burj Khalifa entry fee at least 48 hours before the visit.

Q. Which restaurants at Burj Khalifa are the best for dinner?

Some of the following most popular restaurants at the Burj Khalifa are:

  • Amal: This restaurant serves lip-smacking Indian cuisine. Do try the Dal Makhani and Naan.
  • Atmosphere: You’ll love having high tea here. Dig into delicious snacks at what is the world’s highest restaurant.
  • Ristorante: If Italian cuisine is what you crave, head straight to Ristorante when you’re in Dubai. So, take your pick from delicious pasta on cheese slab or the wood fire pizza.
